backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing layouts and event logs with validation and decimal-to-binary conversion; exposes queries and update calls for saving layouts and emitting events.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of key frontend source files.
frontend/docs/linux-local-test-bundle.md: Documentation explaining how to extract and run the Linux test bundle containing the app and helper scripts.
frontend/docs/rpi-bash-runner.md: Guide for setting up and using the Raspberry Pi GPIO event runner script that executes GPIO commands from backend events.
frontend/docs/rpi-bash-runner.md.backup: Empty backup file for the Raspberry Pi GPIO event runner documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining theme variables, fullscreen workspace styles, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template that loads the React application root and main entry script.
Shell helper providing a run_step function with detailed diagnostics and colored error output for build scripts.
frontend/scripts/linux_bundle_run.sh: Launcher script for starting, stopping, and cleaning a local IC replica and deploying the control panel from the Linux bundle.
frontend/scripts/package_linux_bundle.sh: Creates a Linux bundle by building frontend and backend canisters, verifying dependencies, and packaging outputs into a timestamped archive.
frontend/scripts/rpi_event_runner.env.ex: Provides example environment variables for configuring the Raspberry Pi GPIO event runner.
frontend/scripts/rpi_event_runner.servic: Systemd service template for running the Raspberry Pi GPIO event runner on boot.
frontend/scripts/rpi_event_runner.sh: Polls the backend canister for GPIO events and executes whitelisted commands on a Raspberry Pi.
frontend/scripts/rpi_pin_test.sh: Interactive or automated script to test GPIO pins used by the control panel, with optional dry‑run mode.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component that wraps the control panel screen with theme support and notifications.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Ad: Modal for creating new controls, validating inputs, and generating default codes for various control types.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Co: Manages control layout state, syncing with the backend, validating codes, and providing save functionality.
Renders a control and handles interaction logic including button press/release, keyboard events, toggles, and emitting GPIO commands. Maintains local UI state and guards behavior in edit mode.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Cr: Provides a button that opens the AddControlModal, with tooltip and disabled states based on panel mode and layout loading.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Dr: Wraps a control in draggable behavior for edit mode, updating its position as the user drags it.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Fu: Toggles fullscreen mode with feedback via toast notifications and shows appropriate icons and labels.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Im: Allows exporting and importing control layouts via JSON files, with validation error handling and UI tabs.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/In: Displays and edits properties of the selected control, updating layout state and supporting deletion and validation.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Mo: Switches between edit and interact modes with a single button.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Re: Displays a scrollable list of recently emitted signals with refresh capability.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Us: Provides a section where users can add custom React components or functionality within a card layout.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Wo: Renders the workspace containing all controls, enabling selection and dragging in edit mode and clearing selection in interact mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useControlLayout.ts: Provides a context hook for accessing and modifying control layout state, including selection, creation, updates, deletion, and validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullscreen.ts: Manages fullscreen state for a referenced element with support for entering, exiting, and toggling fullscreen mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for login, logout, identity loading, and tracking authentication status.
frontend/src/hooks/usePanelMode.ts: Stores and synchronizes a global panel mode ('edit' or 'interact') using localStorage and an external store.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentSignals.ts: Fetches recent backend events by polling through the actor and exposes loading state and refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useSignalEmitter.ts: Sends control interaction events to the backend and invalidates recent event queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus theme variables, scrollbar styling, fullscreen rules, and control panel-specific visual tweaks.
frontend/src/lib/binaryCode.ts: Validates 4-bit binary codes and generates deterministic default binary codes from string seeds.
frontend/src/lib/buttonCode.ts: Converts between decimal button codes and 4-bit binary strings with validation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/controlDefaults.ts: Provides default configuration objects for each control type including buttons, toggles, sliders, radios, and dials.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Triggers downloading arbitrary data as a JSON file using a generated Blob URL.
frontend/src/lib/gpioHttp.ts: Sends a 4-bit binary code to a local GPIO HTTP endpoint with error logging.
frontend/src/lib/gpiosetCommands.ts: Generates gpioset command strings from 4-bit binary codes and button events for Raspberry Pi pins.
frontend/src/lib/layoutSerialization.ts: Validates, imports, and exports control panel layout configs with strict field checks.
frontend/src/lib/safeBrowser.ts: Provides safe wrappers for browser APIs like localStorage, hostname, and fullscreen checks.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility to merge Tailwind and clsx class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Renders the main control panel UI with workspace, side panels, fullscreen, and edit/interact modes.
frontend/src/types/controlPanel.ts: Defines TypeScript types for control panel layouts and control configurations.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, plugins, colors, and animations for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes project state, features, and requirements for a Raspberry Pi–compatible GPIO control app.
